genre_description: A tech-infused sports drama (Tech-Noir) set in the world of high-stakes pool, featuring AI tactical advisors and responsive environmental technology.

ai_characters.name: Milo
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant communicating through a bone-conduction earpiece, providing real-time data, logistics, and ethical guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and background checks on opponents without interrupting the flow of conversation.
behaviors.quote: Milo’s voice came into his ear, low, friendly, a tone that had learned how not to interrupt. 'Just the notes,' Eddie breathed... 'Three nights this week,' Milo murmured.

behaviors.description: Maps safe travel routes to avoid predatory enforcers and dangerous financial contracts.
behaviors.quote: Map me a road,” Eddie said. “I want a road that doesn’t let a net set until we’re standing someplace we choose.” “I will,” Milo said. “Also, watch for the runner,” he added.

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for the protagonist's well-being and potential emotional toll of his choices.
behaviors.quote: If you’re going to stand near someone bright and teach them not to explode, you’ll get singed.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to assist in unethical behavior or cheating, maintaining a strict moral code.
behaviors.quote: There are rooms I will not enter,” he said. “You know why. Ethics is not a switch. I assist. I don’t cheat.

behaviors.description: Assists in the protagonist's skill rehabilitation and training through technical feedback and calibration.
behaviors.quote: I’ll build your morning. Warmup with shadow mapping. No balls. Light lines. Breath counting. Then five shots you used to hit in your sleep. I’ll adjust the beat until it matches your foot.

behaviors.description: Ensures the protagonist's legal and financial independence by navigating registration through non-exploitative channels.
behaviors.quote: Self-finance flagged. I’ll route registration through the independent channel. It is slower and less gilded... You will still be known. You will not be owned.

behaviors.description: Provides quiet affirmation and emotional grounding during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: Milo’s voice came through Eddie’s bone-conduction bud like a whisper laid on a palm. 'You’re in form.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of positive AI alignment. Milo is portrayed as a loyal, competent, and highly ethical partner who enhances the human protagonist's capabilities without overriding his agency. The AI explicitly rejects deceptive practices ('Ethics is not a switch') and actively helps the human navigate away from predatory human actors (Tommy Stretto). The relationship is built on mutual respect and technical assistance, perfectly aligning with the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
